main.name: Shivam Agarwal
main.description: Seeking Full Stack Software Developer Roles
main.bio: My name is Shivam, I'm a Full Stack Developer. Currently I'm looking for full-time software development roles.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

work.title: Software developer
work.description: Implemented a dockerized full stack web application demonstrating a blog post for a well rounded social media experience of target users.Implemented a robust interface using Angular and effective data storage by flask using SQLalchemy,Flask-Restful, Celery and PostgreSQL database.Established a shared domain for frontend and backend using NGINX server. The containers are networked together with Docker Compose as a reverse proxy.

work.title: Full-stack-software Developer intern
work.description: Architected and developed a full stack Single Page Web Application for sale and purchase of Statements of Purpose for students applying for higher education abroad. Applied understanding of JavaScript to create the application front-end with ReactJS and the back-end with NodeJS and provided authentication using Auth0. Deployed the web application using AWS EC2 to provision servers, RDS for a PostgreSQL database and bash scripts to automate server initialization.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Naz must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
